channel.title: How to make a chest
channel.description: How to make it so if i have like 100 Enchanted Keys (they stack) in my inventory, i can open a chest. And make the chest have a random amount of money (from 1m-10m).

item.title: How to make a chest
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

Thats a horrible idea…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2008, 01:12:55 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Fabis, post:3, topic:230780”]Does the player.hasItem work? What do i write in it? And how do i make the amount for addItem random?
And what should be the id for the case? The id for the chest?[/quote]
If you wanted it to be random, You would actually need to declare a few things in like item4.java or somethin, and I personally have absolutely no clue what you would need to declare. Maybe ask someone how you would add something to a case like a misc.random(10000) or something, that means that it will give you an amount between 1, and 10000, but I dunno.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a chest
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

uhm, it would look something like this (Dont take mine, its not correct,)
and you need to place it in your other object cases.

case xxxx:
if player.hasItem(xxx, xxxx)
addItem(xxx, xxxx)
break;

that isnt right, but its probably the closest I could help you because im on my mom’s work computer, and I can’t download a source on this.

Read full topic
